USE nyc_taxi_discovery;
-- Using the JSON Value function
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type];



-- To pull out the properties into different columns
SELECT
    JSON_VALUE(jsonDOC, '$.payment_type') payment_type,
    JSON_VALUE(jsonDOC, '$.payment_type_desc') payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type];




   --To specify data type for the columns
SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDOC, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDOC, '$.payment_type_desc') AS VARCHAR(15))payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type];



-- Using the OPENJSON function
SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDOC)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)
    );


--To select the columns you need from the OPENJSON result
SELECT
    payment_type,
    payment_type_desc
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDOC)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc VARCHAR(20)
    );


--rename the columns
SELECT
    payment_type,
    --payment_type_desc
    payment_type_description
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDOC)
    WITH(
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_description VARCHAR(20) '$.payment_type_desc'
    );



------------------------------------
--Reading data from JSON with arrays
------------------------------------

-- Using the JSON Value function
SELECT
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDOC, '$.payment_type') AS SMALLINT) payment_type,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDOC, '$.payment_type_desc[0].value') AS VARCHAR(15))payment_type_desc_0,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE(jsonDOC, '$.payment_type_desc[1].value') AS VARCHAR(15))payment_type_desc_1
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type];




--Using the OPENJSON function to expore the array file
SELECT
*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH
    (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
    WITH(
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        VALUE VARCHAR(20)
    );



--to select the columns required
SELECT
payment_type,
value

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH
    (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
    WITH(
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        value VARCHAR(20)
    );


--To change name of columns on table
SELECT
payment_type,
payment_type_desc_value

FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'payment_type_array.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        PARSER_VERSION = '1.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0a'
    )
    WITH
    (
        jsonDOC NVARCHAR(MAX)
    ) AS [payment_type]
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
    WITH
    (
        payment_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc NVARCHAR(MAX) AS JSON
    )
    CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(payment_type_desc)
    WITH(
        sub_type SMALLINT,
        payment_type_desc_value VARCHAR(20) '$.value'
    );
